message: At MWC Shanghai 2017, ZTE Chief Scientist Dr. Xiang Jiying says that #5G can absolutely achieve the same or better network coverage than 4G: http://bit.ly/2s8r6rx
Have you been keeping up with ZTE’s latest 5G developments at MWC Shanghai 2017? Watch this video to check out the highlights: http://bit.ly/2tr9vyY
In a push to build the world’s largest #5G network, ZTE will double its spending this year on #5G research. Read the full story from @Reuters here: http://reut.rs/2u5mynl
ZTE has just released a new MaaP solution based on RCS technology with AI capabilities- allowing operators to create more compelling user experiences: http://bit.ly/2tqQeO2
ZTE has just successfully broadcast live #VR at MWC Shanghai 2017, demonstrating the strength of #VR for commercial use: http://bit.ly/2u1KLem
We’ve just rolled out a #5G integrated solution to make #5G commercialization a reality. Learn more about what this comprehensive solution has to offer: http://bit.ly/2sUatmq
Today at the Big Video Global Summit 2017 at MWC Shanghai, ZTE and partners discussed new opportunities in video technology, services and business models: http://bit.ly/2umv40m
Watch ZTE CTO Xu Huijun discuss ZTE’s latest innovations showcased at MWC Shanghai 2017 with @MobileWorldLive http://bit.ly/2sUD2zS
Today ZTE hosted the RCS Global Summit 2017 at MWC Shanghai, featuring best practices and innovations in RCS from the industry’s top players. http://bit.ly/2ulvDaX

ZTE discussed growing opportunities for virtualization projects involving the use of #5G technologies in 4G networks during a press conference at MWC Shanghai 2017, targeting 300 networks by the end of the year. http://bit.ly/2tnTpGf
#ZTE believes cloud networks are the future of network development - we have just released a technical white paper on ElasticNet OES. Read more: http://bit.ly/2uhz2HE
Today at MWC Shanghai China Mobile and ZTE launched a live #5G field test in Guangdong, showcasing a 5G eMBB user experience scenario. http://bit.ly/2sgDZ73
ZTE kicked off the first day at MWC Shanghai by hosting the #5G Industry Summit, promoting collaboration for the stable development of the 5G industry. http://bit.ly/2slrRge
ZTE is committed every day to connecting you to a bigger world. MWC Shanghai is happening now through July 1st- visit our booth today. http://bit.ly/2t0dU9s
ZTE CTO Xu Huijin sat down with @MobileWorldLive ahead of MWC Shanghai to discuss opportunities around 5G, IoT and video. http://bit.ly/2skibTo
We are proud to announce that ZTE has just won the bid to provide a digital hybrid STB solution to @Turksat, one of the world’s leading DTH and cable operators. http://bit.ly/2ubDc3U
Make sure you register for the RCS Global Summit at #MWCS17 to hear industry experts discuss the newest innovations in RSC services and business models.
Check out the line-up of events at the Big Video Global Summit 2017 at #MWC2017. We hope you can join the summit to hear from ZTE execs, and stop by our booth to see live 5G demonstrations!

We have successfully completed interoperability testing with @InfoVista on our combined SD-WAN solution by integrating InfoVista’s Ipanema solution with our Micro Cloud Gateway platform. http://bit.ly/2sHpKXr

What do you think is this year’s most important tech innovation? We think it’s SDMA: Space Division Multiple Access. It’s very important for both Pre5G and 5G: find out why here: http://bit.ly/2s2esti
Are you ready for the commercialization of 5G? We are! Let us show you what we can offer in the fast approaching 5G era: http://bit.ly/2s2byot

5G may soon make the Internet of Everything a reality, connecting people and people, people and things, and things and things anytime, anywhere. Hear more at the #5G Industry Summit jointly hosted by ZTE and GSMA at #MWCS17

We are excited to announce that ZTE has just won the bid for 3 networks in True’s beyond 100G backbone WDM network project in Thailand. We are committed to helping True create a high-performance backbone dense WDM network. http://bit.ly/2sHzQG7
We are proud to announce that our ZENIC SDON solution just won the “Best Overall Multi-layer SDN Controller Implementation” award at #NGON2017 http://bit.ly/2rTXdiI
ZTE shares rose 5.11% to a 2-year high on Wednesday thanks to our clear #5G strategy outlined by ZTE Chairman Yin Yimin. Read more from SCMP: http://bit.ly/2rU3FWT

We have just announced the launch of our new DCI-dedicated stackable 100G + E-optical transport network product ZXONE 7000 at #NGON2017 in Nice, France. It features small size, large capacity, low power & easy maintenance. http://bit.ly/2sp4fdY

We showcased our E-OTN solution this week at #NGON2017 in Nice, France which achieves continuous technical optimisation, innovation and facilitates ultrafast #5G service deployment http://bit.ly/2sOB1FR
Don’t miss ZTE Senior Vice President Xu Ming speaking at the Transport Network Transformation Summit at MWC Shanghai about network transformation and the cloud era.
ZTE Assistant CEO Anders Karlborg discusses ZTE’s plan to transform & digitalize its supply chain to meet new demands. Watch now: http://bit.ly/2rPvBGD
Check out our booth at the @GSMA Mobile World Congress Shanghai 2017 featuring live #5G tests, #5G network slicing demos and more.

We’re proud to announce that our next-generation ZXONE 9700 equipment has been rated as “Leader” on the core packet-optical platform by GlobalData, a world-renowned telecommunications, software and IT service consulting company.
Our SDN/NFV commercial application allows operators achieve network transformation to meet growing demands in the #5G era. Watch this video to learn more: http://bit.ly/2tAmYRu

ZTE’s industry leading FDD Massive MIMO Solution lets us apply #5G technology in the existing #4G network to meet new demands and improve customer experience. Watch this video to learn more: http://bit.ly/2sFXNAM

With the data explosion created by 5G it's an exciting time for Optical networks, so we can’t wait to head to next week’s Next Generation Optical Networking (NGON) & Optical DCI in Nice. We will present our cutting-edge tech and solutions – join us!

We were at the OPNVF Summit in Beijing which brings together the people and companies that are accelerating Network Function Virtualization (NFV) deployments. We were excited to debut our latest PaaS (Platform As A Service) platform DevOps Builder 2.0.
ZTE introduces the world's first carrier DevOps-based network slice, enabling operators to meet diversified industry needs in the #5G era at 5G World 2017.
It’s all about 5G this week as we head to London for 5G 2017: check out this video to see how ZTE’s flagship technologies will change the world. http://bit.ly/2srkjwi

China has started preparation early for next-gen networks and ZTE is proud to say that we are the first vendor to conduct the 26 GHz high-frequency field test in the 2nd phase of China's 5G test. #TomorrowNeverWaits http://bit.ly/2szbukj

ZTE has signed an agreement with #SoftBank for a #5G trial, under real world conditions, in Tokyo. ZTE has had a long-term partnership with SoftBank and is looking forward to delivering end-to-end 5G solutions to the bank and its customers in the near future. http://bit.ly/2snEn2k

ZTE is all set for #MWC2017 Shanghai where it will be showcasing 5G innovations, Cloudification, Big Video and the latest phone technology, as well as participating at a number of events. See below for highlights. We look forward to seeing you there.
Luxurious design. Powerful audio. HD display. The ZTE Blade X Max is pure entertainment. Check out more on http://bit.ly/2sT4dJk

ZTE is ahead of the game and has brought 5G tech into the 4G network so customers can enjoy a high-speed network, Want to know more about what Massive MIMO can do? Check out this video: http://bit.ly/2r2nZRu

Our Pre5G Massive MIMO technology won two major awards from the GSMA, but what’s it all about? Find out more on how ZTE’s Pre5G technology will power us all into a new 5G era by checking out this video: http://bit.ly/2slmjX2

In the coming 5G era, massive connections will become key so we’re proud to announce that ZTE completed the mMTC field test in the 2nd phase of China's 5G test and the no. of connected terminals increased by nearly 600%. http://bit.ly/2sWgM5U

We’re proud of our long-standing relationship with Pakistan which has just been strengthened as we extend digital television services into more regions of the country, including mountainous areas. http://cnb.cx/2sR47Bo

ZTE leverages Qcell in the modernisation of Changsha Huanghua Airport’s wireless network, deploying #5G in existing 4G networks and providing massive amounts of data, speed and #IoT applications. http://bit.ly/2rGBpUx

ZTE announces strategic partnership agreement on #5G & #IoT with Telenet, the largest cable broadband provider in Belgium, deepening collaboration between the two companies on next generation #tech http://bit.ly/2sv6BpE
ZTE will showcase its remote control service for #5G #VR submarines at the 5G World Summit 2017 in London, demonstrating the breakthroughs of 5G applications in underwater research.

Entering the Gigabit era, ZTE and leading regional network operator NetCologne set a new record for G.fast@212MHz with speeds of more than 1.8Gbps at Angacom, Germany’s largest broadband exhibition. http://bit.ly/2sgkrMx

Sometimes it’s hard to imagine how smart cities can change people’s lives for the better. But for the people in Yinchuan in China, the city’s partnership with ZTE has made life easier and healthier as this great story in the Straits Times shows. http://bit.ly/2s0bjyr

Our 2017 Leading 5G Innovations Tour is in full swing and we’re delighted to announce our next stops. We’ll be talking tech and would love you to join us in: 
Russia - May 30 
Ukraine - Jun 7-8 
Belarus - Jun 13-15 
Kazakhstan - Jun 19 & 21 
Uzbekistan - Jun 26-30

Did you know ZTE doubled its R&D spending on 5G in 2016 to $400 million and now has 1600 people working on the technology at four dedicated research facilities in China, Europe and the US? http://bit.ly/2riyKzX
At the Third Global #5G Event this week in #Tokyo, ZTE advocated a globally harmonized ecosystem for 5G mobile communication for healthy development of the industry. http://bit.ly/2rvVU9g

We have a busy summer ahead! In June, we start a six-month ZTE Innovation Day tour, taking in countries from Spain to Hungary, Mexico to Argentina. We’ll show off our most popular products and thoughts on the hot tech topics of the day. Come join us!

We’re thrilled that our next-gen RCS technology has won us the “Most Ambitious Solution for Rich Communications” award at the IMS World Forum. What does it mean for you? Better and more innovative services from your carrier. http://bit.ly/2qmFE5f

We’ve just won with China Mobile Research Institute the Global Telecoms Business Infrastructure Innovation award for vBRAS based on C/U separation. Want to know more about what ZTE brings you with carrier-grade vBRAS? Check out this handy guide:

We’re proud to win the lead role in China Mobile’s Packet Transport Network project, with more than 70% allocation, adding to our existing partnership. ZTE’s PTN/SPTN technology will enable smoother network evolution toward 5G. http://bit.ly/2qeqWNM

We’re dedicated to architecture innovation so we’re delighted we’ve won the Infrastructure Innovation award with China Mobile Research Institute at the Global Telecoms Business Awards! http://bit.ly/2rgl7Ea

We aim to give viewers the best possible TV experience so we’re thrilled that ZTE and KPN have jointly won the 2017 Global Telecoms Business ‘Consumer Service Innovation Award’ for our ultra-high definition pay TV project. http://bit.ly/2rOEOAh

At Critical Communications World 2017 in Hong Kong last week, we showcased our emergency management platform for public safety, integrating real-time Big Data, IoT and AI, already used in 40 countries/areas. Convergence and intelligence are the trend!

Today through May 25, we’re at Small Cells World Summit 2017 in London with the Small Cell Forum and industry partners, showcasing our Qcell Plus mobile broadband indoor solution. This translates to better internet in malls, offices and public areas!

Want to see the most cutting-edge 5G technology? Our 5G Europe & America Tour runs through October, including the USA, Spain, Austria, Netherlands, Belgium, Italy, Mexico and Ecuador. Join us to see how ZTE is leading 5G innovations for tomorrow.

This week, ZTE President Zhao Xianming signed an agreement on cooperation with the Minister of Security of Jujuy, Argentina, at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing, under the witness of Chinese President Xi Jinping and Argentine President Macri.

Also at the OBOR Forum, ZTE EVP Zhang Zhenhui signed a new cooperation to promote digital TV and the DTMB standard with Pakistan’s national TV station, represented by Secretary-General Zahoor Ahmad Barlas, with great significance for both sides.

At the recent One Belt One Road Forum, ZTE executives met with the prime ministers and officials of Argentina, Pakistan, Sri Lanka, Ukraine, Ethiopia, Greece and Vietnam, reaching new agreements to strengthen cooperation toward industry development.
Our EVP Zhang Zhenhui told CNBC that he believes China’s Belt and Road initiative will take ZTE’s international expansion to the next level. Here’s a link in case you missed it: http://bit.ly/2qzkh4r
Want a network with automation and intelligence? Us too – that’s why our network operation solution 2.0 can promote next-gen operation evolution. Thanks for having us, TM Forum! http://bit.ly/2pN8BMn

On May 24-26, ZTE will showcase our leading 5G innovations in Tokyo at Wireless Technology Park 2017 and the Third Global 5G Event, organized by the 5G Mobile Forum. We’re proud to represent China’s IMT 2020 group to speak on 5G development trends.

Today is World Telecoms Day – anyone knows why it’s celebrated on May 17? 
May 17 marks the founding of ITU, the UN agency responsible for issues that concern information and communication technologies, as well as the signing of the first International Telegraph Convention in 1865.

ZTE tested our high-precision Mobile Edge Computing (MEC) indoor positioning solution at Wanda Shopping Plaza with China Mobile Beijing. Accurate within 5 meters, this will let carriers and shops tailor your shopping experience! http://bit.ly/2pR23Yi

In the second phase of China’s 5G tests with the industry, ZTE is making breakthroughs in technical solution verifications of key technologies. We’re taking the lead in R&D on the road to commercial use of 5G in China by 2020. http://bit.ly/2qLLLVg

In an interview with China Daily, ZTE President Zhao Xianming shares his vision of an information superhighway to support One Belt One Road. ZTE already provides wireless and cable services in 52 countries in the OBOR network: http://bit.ly/2qiekZk

At the One Belt One Road Forum, ZTE President Zhao Xianming met with the Prime Minister of Ethiopia, who expressed appreciation for ZTE’s pioneering role in Ethiopia’s telecom industry and reaffirmed our strategic partnership for ICT development.

Hey, you: when was the last time you picked up your phone and called your mum? This Mother’s Day, even if you’re not with her, make her feel like you are and use our video call solutions. Pick up the  🤳

ZTE and China Mobile, China Mobile Zhejiang and the China Mobile Jiaxing Branch have completed testing of its 3D multiple input multiple output (3D-MIMO). So what does this mean? 4G users can soon enjoy 5G-like access experience!

Who wants interoperability across OpenStack cloud environments? We do – so we’re happy to say our cloud management platform Tulip Elastic Cloud System has successfully passed this year’s Interop Challenge.

¡Estupendo! We love all things Spanish so we’re thrilled to announce the renewal of our partnership with football legends Sevilla FC! Two great teams, working together. Let’s hope for a strong season ahead! http://bit.ly/2q1Rfu3

Watch this short video to see why our partners trust us to take them into the #5G era. We work side by side with operators to promote #5G commercialization & industrialization, & we look forward to more trusted partnerships in the future.

We’ve released a white paper discussing our industry-leading ZENIC Unified Controller, giving our customers & partners a better understanding of how this solution can be used in network scenarios. http://bit.ly/2qrKgbs

Our whirlwind Leading 5G Innovation Tour is off to Delhi, India today! And we’re not finished there: catch us in Mumbai on May 12, Pakistan on May 15 and Myanmar from May 23-26. Stay tuned for more updates on where you can see our latest commercial solutions and 5G products as we continue to drive 5G innovation all over the world.
ZTE debuted at the #NFVWorldCongress in San Jose, CA, sharing our experiences in NFV/SDN commercial use and its role in network transformation. http://bit.ly/2qrKgbs
We continually leverage our #IP management strategy to power #5G growth. Our proprietary Pre5G technology is now bringing users improved performance and speed in 30 countries. http://bit.ly/2pqNVb3
Are you ready for Smart City 3.0? ZTE is focusing on urban and local digital transformation: check out our blueprint for intelligent cities. http://bit.ly/2pAbLzN

ZTE wins 2016 Transport Network #SDN Interoperability Standardization Best Practice Award at 2017 China SDN/NFV Conference for its Elastic Network Intelligent Controller software defined optical network solution. http://bit.ly/2qrKgbs

More OSCAR success! ZTE are celebrating three Open Source Technology Innovation trophies at the Global Cloud Computing Open Source Summit, Beijing. We’re very proud as these awards are recognition of ZTE’s commitment to driving innovation. http://bit.ly/2oP1n4Y
Our ZTE Leading 5G Innovation Tour is in full swing: check out this infographic for some of the tour’s highlights, and to find out more on how we drive 5G, join us on our next stop!

Congratulations to Lin Zhaoji and Huang Zheng: our experts are joining key study groups on the development of IoT, driving the development of Smart Parking, Smart Street Lights and Blockchain at ITU-T, the global industry body. http://bit.ly/2poFqO6

We’ve won an Oscar! OK, not the Hollywood version, but the Open Source Cloud Alliance for Industry (OSCAR): we won the Outstanding Enterprise award for superior interoperability after we successfully passed the Interop Challenge. http://bit.ly/2q4mxOC

Today is World Intellectual Property Day and we’re proud that we are a global leader in 5G research with 1,500+ patents on 5G. In 2016 ZTE advanced Pre5G commercialization with 40+ networks in 30 countries, and this year we’ve released a full range of 5G pre-commercial base stations. For more info:

ZTE announces a plan to offer stock options to more than 2,000 employees as incentives, in a program tied to the company’s financial performance. A 5-year program was approved offering a combined total of 150 million shares. http://bit.ly/2oGU1Ba

ZTE & @bangalinkmela agree to build the world’s largest virtual Subscriber Data Management platform (VSDM), providing 35 million Bangalink users with faster mobile broadband, video chat, multimedia conference and more. http://bit.ly/2pbCXGI

Been watching out for something amazing? Well, the ZTE Quartz smart watch is here, and if we may say so, it’s the best way to experience Android Wear 2.0 without breaking the bank. It may look classic, but its superb call quality is cutting-edge. http://bit.ly/2oXX2OA

ZTE and global telecoms operator VEON have signed a global framework agreement, creating a new era of cooperation in virtualisation technology innovation. It also shows ZTE’s commitment to bringing innovative technology solutions to operators. http://bit.ly/2oXSoCh

Congrats to two colleagues who are now editors producing a global universal air interface for 5G at standards body 3GPP. Our very own Sergio Parolari and Yang Li are helping to lead the charge towards 3GPP 5G NR standardisation. http://bit.ly/2oS5q23
We’re celebrating the launch of our cutting-edge network operation centre in Uganda which will help our partner MTN Uganda to deliver a superior service. http://bit.ly/2o1NnJL

You’ve heard of 5G but it hasn’t yet filled you with glee? If this is you for sure, come find out more at our Leading 5G Innovation Tour!
Come see us in Indonesia (Apr 17/18/20/21) or Singapore (Apr 20/21/24) to see our commercial solutions, 5G products as well as all the latest on the top 5G trends. Can’t promise any poetry though.

ZTE posted a rise of 27.8% in first-quarter profit with sales growth in smartphones and carrier network solutions. Innovation powers our growth as we continue to lead R&D in 5G, Internet of Things, cloudification and more. http://bit.ly/2pvvrEg
Everyone here at ZTE hopes you have an eggsellent #Easter filled with the sweetest of treats.

When the worst happens, the ability to communicate becomes all the more important. That’s why ZTE has teamed up with the Quanzhou branch of China Telecom to develop an emergency solution based on pioneering drone technology. http://bit.ly/2oWFQfr
